description:
Turns out that my previous revision messed up the lyrics even more (since I exported from gp7 to gp5 file and it had issues), so I fixed it
The drum used to be much more readable, but in the conversion they all got mashed up to like 2 lines, if anyone with gp5 can fix this that'd be great
title: The Hell Song

description:
The tempo of the song is weird (seems like 173.5 bpm or something), so fixed it by placing a bpm change in the middle of the tab (had to listen to the song and the track simultaneously multiple times for this)
Also fixed the lyrics (off position)
title: The Hell Song

description: Lyrics! Removed useless rests, fixed slides and bends. Small addition to backing vocals and other fixes in all tracks.
title: The Hell Song
